body_html: @apaszke I've cleaned up the test_torch.py tests so that digamma and trigamma now have simple tests like other math functions. I also switched to a simple Stirling approximation rather than finite difference. We should still swap in @zou3519's Cephes port for digamma() when we get permission since this PR doesn't correctly handle INFINITY at poles and is less precise.
